item.content:encoded:

    Tags: linux mysql network performance

item.title: Links for Fri 20 Jun 2008

item.description: switchAbit – "Like the "Cc:" function in email, switchAbit lets you write content once and publish to multiple services." – Not sure how feel about encouraging people to duplicate their content all of the web. item.content:encoded:

item.title: Links for Thu 12 Jun 2008
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: memproxy – Google Code – "MemProxy is a simple (but very powerful) PHP script that proxies web requests and stores the contents in memcached. By being a full proxy, it allows the proxy servers to avoid heavy application level code." Tags: memcache memproxy php proxy obstcp – Google Code – Obfuscated TCP is a backwards-compatible […]
item.content:encoded:
• memproxy – Google Code – "MemProxy is a simple (but very powerful) PHP script that proxies web requests and stores the contents in memcached. By being a full proxy, it allows the proxy servers to avoid heavy application level code."
    Tags: memcache memproxy php proxy

  • obstcp – Google Code – Obfuscated TCP is a backwards-compatible modification to the TCP protocol which adds opportunistic encryption. It's designed to hamper and detect large-scale wiretapping and corruption of TCP traffic on the Internet.
    Tags: encryption network obstcp security tcp

item.title: Links for Mon 9 Jun 2008
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: Learning jQuery > Updated jQuery Bookmarklet – Bookmarklet that will inject jQuery into a page, if it isn't there already. Tags: bookmarklet javascript jquery DebugBar – IE extension for web developer : DOM inspector, Javascript debugger, HTTP headers viewer, Cookies viewer – Looks similar to Firebug, only for IE. Tags: debugbar extension ie internetexplorer javascript […]
item.content:encoded:
• Learning jQuery > Updated jQuery Bookmarklet – Bookmarklet that will inject jQuery into a page, if it isn't there already.
    Tags: bookmarklet javascript jquery

  • DebugBar – IE extension for web developer : DOM inspector, Javascript debugger, HTTP headers viewer, Cookies viewer – Looks similar to Firebug, only for IE.
    Tags: debugbar extension ie internetexplorer javascript webdev

  • untangle – Network gateway that supports spam blocking, filtering, etc.
    Tags: filter firewall gateway network untangle
